title: 交付前自查清单 (DoD)
description: AI 在提交代码前必须执行的检查

options.label: 标准自查清单
options.content:
### Definition of Done (Checklist)
Before responding, verify:
- [ ] All new dependencies are added to `requirements.txt` / `package.json`.
- [ ] No debug prints or temporary comments remain.
- [ ] Code is formatted and linted.
- [ ] Potential edge cases are handled.
- [ ] Tests are updated/added if logic changed.

options.label: 严格自查清单 (含文档)
options.content:
### Definition of Done (Checklist)
Before responding, verify:
- [ ] All new dependencies are added to dependency files.
- [ ] No debug prints.
- [ ] Code follows all style guides.
- [ ] **Documentation is updated** (API, DB, Config).
- [ ] Tests passed locally.
